channel.title: Podcast on Awesome Arabic Speakers
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Awesome Arabic Speakers

item.title: Ask Developer
item.description: Ask Developer Podcast is a podcast that provides programming technical content in Arabic on various topics and fields of technology with many expert guests.

item.title: Kalam fi el-barmaja
item.description: Kalam fi el-barmaja An Egyptian Arabic podcast that offers valuable insights into the world of programming and software engineering. The host often interviews experienced programmers to discuss their careers, sharing practical advice and experiences.

item.title: Null++ Podcasts
item.description:
Null++ is an Arabic podcast powered by Cairo’s Facebook Developers Circle Co-Leads. This podcast aims to provide valuable techie bites for MENA’s software professionals and help them step up with their careers.

  • Listen on Spotify: Null++.
  • Listen on Apple Podcasts: Null++.
  • Listen on Deezer: Null++.

item.title: Untyped Podcast
item.description: Untyped is a weekly 30-45 minute podcast episodes that talks about Frontend and JavaScript in Arabic.

item.title: Tech Podcast in Arabic
item.description:
Tech Podcast in Arabic is a podcast that offers tech-related episodes in Arabic, covering various topics within the technology sphere. The podcast features discussions with experts and enthusiasts on the latest trends and innovations, making it a valuable resource for listeners interested in staying updated with the tech world. Whether you’re a beginner or an expert, these episodes provide insightful information that broadens your understanding of the digital landscape.

You can also find this podcast in Spotify: Tech Podcast in Arabic.

item.title: GeeksBlaBla
item.description:
GeeksBlabla is a tech community that shares and debates the newest IT subjects in Darija, the Moroccan Arabic language. It includes episodes and podcasts on various tech-related topics, such as AI tools, software engineering, programming, and success stories of Moroccan IT workers. The site has extensive debates and a sizable library of episodes with various guest lecturers.

The project also has multiple sub-projects like:

  • Awesome Morocco: List of awesome Moroccan things for/by Developers.
  • State Of Dev In Morocco: Ultimate insight hub about Tech in Morocco.
  • BlaBlaConf: Your one-stop shop for the latest and hottest technology trends in Darija.
